sen.j: 深山（みやま）は大阪府豊能郡能勢町と京都府南丹市との境界に位置する山。
sen.e: Mt. Miyama is a mountain which locates in the boundary between Nose-cho, Toyono-gun, Osaka Prefecture and Nantan City, Kyoto Prfecture.
Mt. Miyama is a mountain which is located in the boundary between Nose-cho, Toyono-gun, Osaka Prefecture and Nantan City, Kyoto Prfecture.
Mt. Miyama is a mountain which is located in the boundary between Nose-cho, Toyono-gun, Osaka Prefecture and Nantan City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 標高790.5mで北摂山群の最高峰である。
sen.e: It rises 790.5 meters above sea level and the highest of the hokusetsuyamagun.
It rises 790.5 meters above sea level and is the highest of the hokusetsuyamagun.
It rises 790.5 meters above sea level and is the highest of the Hokusetsu mountains (a group of mountains including Mt. Miyama, Mt. Hangoku, Mt. Ono, Mt. Mikusa and Mt. Myoken).
sen.cmt: 北摂山群→Hokusetsu mountains (a group of mountains including Mt. Miyama, Mt. Hangoku, Mt. Ono, Mt. Mikusa and Mt. Myoken) としました。

sen.e: It is one of the 50 mountains in Osaka.
It is one of 50 mountains in Osaka.
It is one of 50 mountains in Osaka.

sen.j: 大阪府北部の最高峰でもあり、標高の高さの割に良い展望を有している。
sen.e: It is also the highest of the north Osaka and offers a nice view despite its height.
sen.cmt: 前の文章、及びこの文章の前半から山の高さが高いことが示唆されますが、（登山家によりますと）標高790.5mは高い山ではないとのことでしたので、そのため「高さが高くないわりによい展望」と解釈して訳しました。
sen.e: It is also the highest in north Osaka and offers a nice view despite its height.
It is also the highest in north Osaka and offers a nice view despite its height.

sen.j: 登山ルートは大きく三つある。
sen.e: There are mainly three climbing routes.
There are mainly three climbing routes.
There are mainly three climbing routes.

sen.j: 最もポピュラーなルートは奥るり渓方面からアプローチするもので、頂上まで1時間50分ほどが必要である。
sen.e: The most popular one is to approach from Okururikei River Valley, and it takes approximately one hour and fifty minutes.
The most popular one is an approach from Okururikei River Valley, and it takes approximately one hour and fifty minutes.
The most popular one is an approach from Okururikei River Valley, and it takes approximately one hour and fifty minutes to reach the mountain top.
sen.cmt: 頂上まで を追加しました。

sen.j: 奥るり渓には能勢電鉄日生中央駅もしくは、JR山陰本線園部駅からバスがある。
sen.e: To Okururikei River Valley, buses go from Nose Electric Railway Nissei-chuo Station or JR Sanin Main Line Sonobe Station.
To Okururikei River Valley, buses go from Nose Electric Railway Nissei-chuo Station or JR Sanin Main Line Sonobe Station.
To Okururikei River Valley, buses go from Nose Electric Railway Nissei-chuo Station or JR Sanin Main Line Sonobe Station.

sen.j: もう一つは、広野方面からアプローチするもので、広野には亀岡駅からバスがある。
sen.e: Another route is to approach from Hirono district and buses go from Kameoka Station.
Another route is to approach from Hirono district and buses go from Kameoka Station.
Another route is to approach from Hirono district and buses go from Kameoka Station.
It takes approximately two hours and fifty minutes.
It takes approximately two hours and fifty minutes.
It takes approximately two hours and fifty minutes.

sen.j: その他には兵庫県側からアプローチする方法もある。
sen.e: The other route is to approach from Hyogo prefecture side.
The other route is to approach it from the Hyogo prefecture side.
The other route is to approach it from the Hyogo Prefecture side.

sen.j: 福住からささやまの森公園、庫坂峠、舩坂山を経由して2時間半程度で山頂に着くことができる。
sen.e: From Fukusumi, it takes approximately two and an half hour to the top of the mountain by way of Sasayamanomori Park, Kosaka-toge Pass, and Mt. Funasaka.
From Fukusumi, it takes approximately two and an half hours to the top of the mountain by way of Sasayamanomori Park, Kosaka-toge Pass, and Mt. Funasaka.
From Fukusumi, it takes approximately two and an half hours to the top of the mountain by way of Sasayamanomori Park, Kosaka-toge Pass, and Mt. Funasaka.

sen.j: 中京バス奥るり渓バス停
sen.e: Okururi-kei bus stop of Chuo Bus
Okururi-kei bus stop of Chuo Bus
Okururi-kei bus stop of Chuo Bus

sen.j: 無料シャトルバスいやしの森バス停
sen.e: Iyashi no mori bus stop of free Shuttle Bus
Iyashi no mori bus stop of free Shuttle Bus
Iyashi no mori bus stop of free shuttle bus
sen.cmt: shuttle bus 小文字にしました。

sen.e: Fukusumi bus stop of Shinki Bus
Fukusumi bus stop of Shinki Bus
